General.Name: Atende S.A.
General.Description: Atende S.A. engages in the integration of IT systems and development of ICT infrastructures in Poland. The company offers ICT integration solutions to build computer networks and data centers, which develop digital workplace, as well as provides IT security solutions for defense, telecommunications, energy, and finance sectors. It also offers data center infrastructure and IT solutions. In addition, the company provides cloud services to public clouds, and computing and disk related resources, as well as offers software and applications solutions. Further, it provides artificial intelligence, machine learning, and internet of things services. It serves power engineering industries. The company was formerly known as ATM Systemy Informatyczne S.A. and changed its name to Atende S.A. in April 2013. Atende S.A. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland.
